All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Board
Class to manage the game board.
Bookshelf
Class used to manage matrix which contains the tiles selected by the player.
Chat
Class that implements an ArrayList of messages creating a chat.
ChatController
Class to manage all Chats behavior.
ChatHandler
Class to manage the Chat in CLI.
ChatMessage
Class for message sent by client and server used for chat.
CheckManager
Class used to make checks based on the current player and the current state.
ClientBase
Class to manage the Client.
ClientState
Class to save all the reference client's information received from the server (one ClientState for each instance Client).
ClientStateRemoteInterface
Interface of ClientState.
CLIMain
Class to manage the Command Line Interface.
CLIPrint
Class to print all the game's information on the terminal.
ColorCLI
Enumeration of ANSI escaped codes used for Command User Interface's color.
ColumnIsFull
Exception thrown when a player wants to add a tile to his bookshelf but the chosen column doesn't have enough space left.

Abstract class.

Controller
Class used to manage multiple games together and the interaction of the players/clients with those games.
Define
Enumeration which contains all constant number used in the programme.
EndGameController
Class to manage the final scene (End Game scene).
EndGameForDisconnectionController
Class to manage the final scene (End Game For Disconnection scene)
GameControllerChat
Class to manage the game scene.
GameState
Enumeration which contains states of the state machine.
GUIController
Class to manage the GUI Start the GUI; close the GUI; change GUI's scene; send message to the server; received message from the server.
GUIControllerStatic
Class that is used to make the scene controllers have the reference to the GUIController, it is used to make so that they can send messages to the server and receive messages from the server.
InitialRequestController
Class to manage the initial request scene.
IntArrayMessage
Class for message sent by client and server which contains an array of integer number.
IntMessage
Class for message sent by client and server which contains an integer number.
JsonReader
Class used to read int number from a file Json.
Launcher
Class to launch the My Shelfie Application.
Lobby
Class used to manage the creation of lobbies and games.
LobbyNotExists
Exception thrown when a lobby does not exist.
LoginController
Class to manage the login scene.
Matrix
Class that implements a matrix which contains Tiles.
Message
Class for the all the message sent by client and server
MessageTypes
Enumeration which contains all kind of message types.
Model
Class used to control the evolution of the game.
MoveNotPossible
Umbrella Exception to contain all others.
MyShelfieApplication
Class that lets you chose if you want to open Server or Client.
Networker
Interface used to manage connection.
NetworkerRmi
Class that regulates the RMI_Client.
NetworkerTcp
Class used to manage the tcp connection.
NotCurrentPlayer
Exception thrown when a player tries to make a move when it is not his turn.
NumberOfPlayerController
Class that manages the number of player scene.
OutOfDomain
Exception thrown when a chosen point is outside the domain.
PersonalObjective
Class to manage the personal objective.
Player
Class used to manage player's personal information.
PointsMessage
Class for message sent by client and server which contains an arraylist of point.
Reader
Class used to read all the message sent from the controller and modify client state.
ReadShell
Class to read all the strings that the user enters from the command line.
RMIHandler
Class that forwards all messages form a RMI Client to the actual Controller.
RMIHandlerInterface
Remote interface of the RMI client handler used for RMI connection.
RMITimer
A countdown timer used with RMI connection.
RMIVirtualView
RMI implementation of the virtual view.
Sachet
Class used to manage the sachet.
SameElement
Exception thrown when a player chooses more than one tile.
SceneController
Interface of common things in scene controller.
Scenes
Enumeration of the Graphic User Interface scene Initial request scene; Login scene; number of player scene; waiting for other players scene; game scene; end game scene; end game for disconnection scene.
Server
Class to manage the Server.
ServerClientHandler
Class used as a support to communicate with tcp-using clients.
State
Enumeration of the game states.
TCPVirtualView
TCP implementation of the virtual view.
Tile
Class used to associate to each tile the corresponding path for the image.
Tiles
Enumeration of the different kind of tile that is possible to use.
TilesCannotBeSelected
Exception thrown when a tile cannot be selected.
TilesNotAdjacent
Exception thrown picked tiles are not adjacent to each other.
TimerCounter
Class, that extends TimerTask, which implements a counter.
TimerInterface
Interface for classes that use countdown timers.
TooManySelected
Exception thrown when a user selected too many tiles.
UsernameAlreadyTaken
Exception thrown when a username is already taken.
View
Interface of common things in User Interface - (CLI and GUI).
ViewMessage
Class for message sent by client and server which will modify the client state.
VirtualView
An interface used for virtual views.
